title: UK bans Coinbase ads implying crypto can ease cost of living concerns
full_text: UK bans Coinbase ads implying crypto can ease cost of living concerns. The ASA upheld complaints that Coinbase's adverts trivialised the risks of investing in cryptocurrency..
